participant_abstract.sent: This meeting familiarised the team members with each other and revealed some characteristics we each find desirable.
This information is useful to me as I will keep it in mind when we make group decisions, since I can appeal to the things each of us find enviable.

Following this gentle introduction, the team leader presented the project goals, discussed the number of remote controls to be sold at what price point, assigned tasks to each team member and planned the next meeting.
My main focus will be on finding out what consumers want beyond the group's annecdotal stories to descriptions of concrete, desirable, sellable remote control units.
I contributed a few ideas off the top of my head which weren't really elaborated upon too extensively by other group members.
I look forward to finding out more about their prespectives at the next meeting.
